meanings.definition: In a spirited and courageous manner
meanings.sent1: She ran spunkily towards the finish line, determined to win the race.
meanings.sent2: The team played spunkily, never giving up despite being behind in the game.
meanings.sent3: The little dog barked spunkily at the big cat, thinking it could scare it away.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter charged spunkily into the burning building to save the trapped family.
meanings.sent5: Her speech was delivered spunkily, inspiring everyone in the audience.

meanings.sent1: The spunkily girl always tackled challenges with a positive attitude.
meanings.sent2: He approached the project spunkily, eager to prove his skills.
meanings.sent3: The spunkily cheerleader led the team with infectious energy and spirit.
meanings.sent4: The spunkily entrepreneur fearlessly pursued her dreams, never backing down.
meanings.sent5: The spunkily student took on every task with a can-do attitude.
